trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML Programming Overview (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML обзор программирования (Visual Basic) | Документы Microsoft

trans-unit.source: LINQ to XML Programming Overview (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: LINQ to XML обзор программирования (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: These topics provide high-level overview information about the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] classes, as well as detailed information about three of the most important classes.
trans-unit.target: В этих подразделах содержится обзор высокого уровня о классах [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)], а также подробные сведения о трех наиболее важных классах.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
Topic
Description
[Functional vs. Procedural Programming (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-vs-procedural-programming-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [Сравнение функционального И процедурного программирования (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-vs-procedural-programming-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides a high level view of the two principle approaches to writing LINQ to XML applications.
trans-unit.target: Содержит представление высокого уровня о двух принципиальных подходах к написанию приложений LINQ to XML.

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to XML Classes Overview (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml-classes-overview.md)
Provides an overview of the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] classes.
[XElement Class Overview (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/xelement-class-overview.md)
Introduces the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> class, which represents XML elements.
<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement> is one of the fundamental classes in the [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] class hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>является одним из фундаментальных классов в [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] иерархии классов.</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XElement>

trans-unit.source: [XAttribute Class Overview (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/xattribute-class-overview.md)
Introduces the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XAttribute> class, which represents XML attributes.
[XDocument Class Overview (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/xdocument-class-overview.md)
Introduces the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XDocument> class, which represents XML documents.
[How to: Build LINQ to XML Examples (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-build-linq-to-xml-examples.md)
trans-unit.target: [Практическое руководство: построение примеров LINQ to XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/how-to-build-linq-to-xml-examples.md)

trans-unit.source: Contains the `Imports` statements that are required to build the LINQ to XML examples.
trans-unit.target: Содержит `Imports` инструкции, необходимые для создания примеров LINQ to XML.

trans-unit.source: See Also
[Programming Guide (LINQ to XML) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/programming-guide-linq-to-xml.md)
